duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide in-home ABA based therapy sessions to families and children on the autism spectrum.
Execute therapy sessions, drive time, and complete administrative work while ensuring quality and effectiveness.
Participate in ongoing paid training, supervision, and support to enhance therapy skills and techniques.
Assist with lifting, carrying, and loading/unloading toys and materials for home visits, and engage in physical activities during therapy sessions.
Maintain flexible work hours, including weekends, and cover specific areas within South OC based on assigned cases.

education_certification.credential: At least some college coursework in early childhood education, psychology, nursing, or related field.
